incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 02/07/2025 23:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment to improve general performance. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 03/07/2025 05:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our backbone infrastructure. Start time : 03/07/2025 05:30 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 09:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams will be doing a maintenance on the network equipment. Thank you for your understanding.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [CCH01][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work in multiple racks

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure. Start time : 03/07/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 16:00 UTC Service impact : Some servers in the following racks: CCH0101E01A, CCH0101E01B, CCH0101E01C, CCH0101E02A, CCH0101E02B, CCH0101E02C, CCH0101E03A, CCH0101E03B, CCH0101E03C, CCH0101E04A, CCH0101E04B, CCH0101E04C, CCH0101D01A, CCH0101D01B, CCH0101D01C, CCH0101D02A, CCH0101D02B, CCH0101D02C, CCH0101D03A, CCH0101D03B, CCH0101D03C, CCH0101D04A, CCH0101D04B and CCH0101D04C might be unavailable during the maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work. Thank you for your understanding.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Start time : 03/07/2025 06:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 15:00 UTC Service impact : The cooling system's efficiency could be temporarily impacted for some servers, which could cause a decreased performance during this maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure. Thank you for your understanding.

We would like to inform you of an urgent intervention on electrical equipment, a proactive measure to prevent potential issues and ensure the continuity of your services. Please be advised that this maintenance will result in a 1 hour downtime on servers. We recommend that you perform a preventive shutdown of your servers. Start time : 03/07/2025 21:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2025 22:00 UTC Service impact : Baremetal (servers unavailable) , webhosting (latencies on logs and metrics) from cluster002 to cluster017.
